Apa yang dimiliki Asha bertujuan untuk menjadi "menarik" untuk disukai ramai orang. Mahisa juga tertarik dengan Asha.

programme.title: Bodyguard Ep3
programme.desc: Mengisahkan semasa Eliza bersama bodyguardnya Danial dia nyaris dilanggar. Mereka syak Amran seorang kakitangan Eliza melakukan cubaan tersebut. Hubungan percintaan Eliza dengan Rashid masih berterusan. Farish sebagai bodyguard, masih meneruskan jagaan keselamatan kepada Adam. Dia beberapa kali menyelamatkan Adam dari dipukul oleh Zack dan rakan kumpulannnya. Adam dikatakan membocor rahsia kumpulan kepada polis sehingga ada di kalangan mereka yang telah tertangkap. Ryan bodyguard Datin Maziah, dia menunjukkan photo perhubungan Datin Maziah dengan Badrul kepada Dato’ Zailani. Akhirnya Dato’ Zailani menceraikan Datin Maziah. Di akhir episod, Amran melihat Rashid berbaik-baik dengan Eliza, dia memberi amaran kepada Rashid untuk membocorkan rahsia mereka kepada Eliza sekiranya tidak memberi wang kepadanya.

programme.title: The Eye 2
programme.desc: Selepas percubaan membunuh diri yang gagal, seorang wanita hamil mendapat keupayaan untuk melihat hantu.

programme.title: Muzium Misteri Ep13
programme.desc: Memaparkan Ana bekas kekasih Shah meminta bantuan menangkap lembaga yang sering mengganggui ibunya. Lantaran itu dengan kerjasama Daniel dan Adam, lembaga itu dapat diperangkap. Dalam pada itu lembaga baju pula muncul, setakat ini telah mengganggui seorang pemuda. Akhir-akhir ini seorang bernama Kiah, janda sejak dua tahun lalu berminat dan melawat muzium encik Bad. Bad ambil kesempatan berbaik dengannya. Sementara itu Nur memberi amaran melalui whatsapp agar Shah jangan cuba mengatal dengan yang lain. Dalam diam-diam Shah keluar makan dengan Ana kerana membantu ibunya. Kemudiannya dengan pujukan Ana, Shah bersetuju menonton wayang. Sementara itu Adam cuba memujuk Nur, tetapi setakat ini Nur negatif, lagi pun dia sebuk menyemak pelajarannya. Shah juga dihubungi oleh puan Sabariah meminta dia menangkap lembaga baju, tetapi setakat ini masih gagal. Sementara itu Bad dipelawa oleh pemilik muzium bersebelahannya agar bergabung dengannya. Adam dengan Shah juga bertengkar sebab Shah diketahui dia keluar dengan Ana, sedangkan dia ada kekasih. Apa pun mereka bertiga masih bersama dalam mengesan lembaga baju di perkarangan rumah Sabariah. Mereka dapat mengesan tetapi lembaga baju itu menyerang merekabertiga dan menghilang diri.

programme.title: Budak Magik Ep1
programme.desc: Episod – 1 memaparkan kisah Imran seorang pelajar yang kematian ibu dan obses dengan magik sering terlibat dalam pergaduhan kerana diganggu oleh pelajar-pelajar nakal di sekolah. Bapa Imran yang malu dengan teguran guru tentang pergaduhan Imran telah menghantar Imran tinggal bersama nenek dan bersekolah dikampung. Minatnya tentang magik telah membuat Imran sentiasa mencari kesempatan untuk mengasah bakat melakukan trik mengguna kad yang sentiasa dibawa kemana sahaja dia pergi. Imran juga dilihat asyik membaca sebuah buku bertajuk budak magik yang kebetulan dijumpai dibawah rumah neneknya.

programme.title: Kuntilanak Ciliwung
programme.desc: Pada suatu hari, Flora yang tertekan kerana ibunya terlalu melindungi, diajak teman lelakinya, Danu, untuk tinggal di rumah kosongnya bersama rakannya Bella dan Marcell. Tetapi pada suatu hari Flora diserang sawan dan mati serta merta selepas api unggun di tepian sungai Ciliwung. Danu dan rakan-rakannya kemudian menanam mayat Flora secara luar biasa. Roh Flora merayau

programme.title: Talak
programme.desc: Johan dan Liza sering bertengkar sehingga membawa kepada penceraian. Tetapi setiap kali ianya terjadi, mereka akan merujuk kembali. Tanpa disedari, Johan telah pun melafazkan talak kepada Liza sebanyak tiga kali, ini menyebabkan mereka tidak boleh merujuk kembali. Johan terpaksa mencari lelaki yang boleh dipercayai untuk berkahwin dengan Liza supaya mereka boleh kembali bersama. Namun, malang menimpa apabila lelaki untuk tidak mahu melepaskan Liza.

programme.title: Ragam Pemandu
programme.desc: Pemandu yang setia dan tidak pernah mengeluh, Hamid tidak disukai oleh isteri tuannya, Rubiah. Tuannya, Rahim pula seorang yang baik hati dan sukakan Hamid. Dia sering membantu membiayai pelajaran anak-anak Hamid dan menyelesaikan masalah yang dihadapi olehnya. Satu pertengkaran menyebabkan Hamid berhenti kerja namun Rahim tampil membantu mengambilnya bekerja di syarikat insurans miliknya.

programme.title: Adik Manja
programme.desc: Guru lelaki pertama di sekolah berasrama penuh perempuan terpaksa menyembunyikan satu rahsia besar apabila terpaksa membawa pulang seorang bayi lelaki. Pelbagai helah terpaksa digunakannya namun diketahui juga oleh pelajar-pelajar institusi itu. Pelajar-pelajar tersebut mengambil keputusan untuk membantunya bersama seorang lagi guru di situ.

programme.title: Langit Petang
programme.desc: Seorang wartawan muda, Hafiz ingin membantu kekasihnya, Ruby. Ruby bergelut untuk mengatasi trauma dan pengalaman buruk dari zaman kecilnya. Hafiz sedang menulis rencana tentang kisah Pak Arif yang memiliki tanah pusaka di kampung. Hashim pula ingin membeli kesemua tanah miliknya dan menggunakan taktik jahat untuk mendapatkannya. Ternyata, Ruby adalah anak saudara kepada Pak Arif.

programme.title: Sikit Punya Gila
programme.desc: Hamid dan Dharma keluar merantau mencari kekayaan di bandar bertemu Nora dan Norlia. Hamid, penjual jagung rebus dan Dharma, penjaga lif tinggal di rumah milik pasangan suami isteri dan berjiran bersama Nora dan Norlia. Kerana ingin mencari kekayaan dengan menggunakan jalan mudah, pelbagai kesusahan terpaksa dihadapi oleh mereka berdua.

programme.title: Konstabel Mamat
programme.desc: Akibat kelalaian dalam operasi menangkap ketua gengster iaitu Mail Musang yang merupakan bapa ayam sindiket pelacuran di Kuala Lumpur, Mamat digantung tugas selama tiga bulan. Meskipun digantung, Mamat tetap rajin dan menjalankan tugas menangkap penjenayah. Mamat yang jatuh cinta dengan kekasih gelap kepada Mail Musang telah diketahui olehnya. Kejadian ini telah membawa kepada penangkapan Mail dan Mamat tidak lagi digantung tugas.

programme.title: Gila-Gila
programme.desc: Jaafar, seorang pembantu di rumah orang kaya bernama Dato' Jaafar Pangku. Niat ingin mengubah nasibnya, Jaafar pun mengambil cuti dua bulan dan pergi ke Kuala Lumpur. Sebelum itu, dia telah meminjam baju dan wang majikannya sebanyak RM3000 atas alasan melawat neneknya yang sakit. Setibanya dia di sana, Jaafar bertemu dengan Kathy dan jatuh cinta. Hal sebenar terbongkar apabila wangnya habis dan terpaksa pulang semula ke Sabah.

programme.title: Panglima Badol
programme.desc: Badol ingin keluar merantau mencari pengalaman hidup seperti apa yang dilakukan bapanya. Ditentang ibunya namun direlakan dengan satu syarat - tidak boleh mengambil tahu perihal orang lain. Setibanya di sebuah pulau, kekecohan berlaku apabila Maya Sari, anak angkat Datuk Tumpang dilarikan konco Datuk Panglima Wira. Badol secara tidak sengaja berjaya menyelamatkan Maya Sari dan diberi gelaran Panglima Badol.

programme.title: Talak
programme.desc: Johan dan Liza sering bertengkar sehingga membawa kepada penceraian. Tetapi setiap kali ianya terjadi, mereka akan merujuk kembali. Tanpa disedari, Johan telah pun melafazkan talak kepada Liza sebanyak tiga kali, ini menyebabkan mereka tidak boleh merujuk kembali. Johan terpaksa mencari lelaki yang boleh dipercayai untuk berkahwin dengan Liza supaya mereka boleh kembali bersama. Namun, malang menimpa apabila lelaki untuk tidak mahu melepaskan Liza.

programme.title: Kemarau Cinta
programme.desc: Seorang pemuda kampung yang ingin membawa perubahan di kampungnya. Pergi menuntut ilmu di bandar, pemuda ini pulang semula ke kampung selepas selesai pengajiannya. Ingin cuba melakukan perubahan demi kemajuan di kampung namun tidak semua bersetuju dengan perubahan yang dibawa olehnya. Pelbagai halangan perlu ditempuhinya namun dia bersikap pantang berundur sebelum berjuang.

programme.title: Tak Ori Tapi Ok
programme.desc: Keinginan seorang pengarah filem yang ingin menghasilkan naskhah baru. Yassin mahu melakukan kemunculan semula setelah sekian lama menemui jalan buntu dalam kerjayanya. Menemui seseorang yang mahu membiayai projek terbarunya, dia pun mula mencari pelakon-pelakon untuk membintanginya. Pelbagai rintangan dihadapinya dalam mencari pelakon yang boleh meniru gaya seperti P.Ramlee.

programme.title: Guru Badul
programme.desc: Badul diambil bekerja di pejabat Hj. Lamin sebagai seorang pengutip hutang. Badul sebenarnya berpura-pura menjadi orang alim membuatkan Hj. Lamin sangat tertarik akan perwatakannya itu. Dia banyak mempelajari ilmu agama dengan Badul dan ingin menjadikannya sebagai seorang menantu. Namun satu insiden telah memecahkan rahsianya apabila Hj. Lamin terlihat Badul sedang menari-nari.

programme.title: Salah Bapak
programme.desc: Jamil dan Osman terpaksa melalui pelbagai rintangan untuk menuntut hak mereka ke atas harta peninggalan Al-Sagof, bapa mereka yang telah meninggal dunia. Pak Joko ingin cuba membolot harta Al-Sagof lalu merancang pelbagai taktik kotor untuk mendapatkannya. Seroja, gadis yang menyewa tapak tanak bapa mereka untuk membuka warung turut terlibat apabila dia digunakan Pak Joko.

programme.title: Panglima Badol
programme.desc: Badol ingin keluar merantau mencari pengalaman hidup seperti apa yang dilakukan bapanya. Ditentang ibunya namun direlakan dengan satu syarat - tidak boleh mengambil tahu perihal orang lain. Setibanya di sebuah pulau, kekecohan berlaku apabila Maya Sari, anak angkat Datuk Tumpang dilarikan konco Datuk Panglima Wira. Badol secara tidak sengaja berjaya menyelamatkan Maya Sari dan diberi gelaran Panglima Badol.

programme.title: Tak Ori Tapi Ok
programme.desc: Keinginan seorang pengarah filem yang ingin menghasilkan naskhah baru. Yassin mahu melakukan kemunculan semula setelah sekian lama menemui jalan buntu dalam kerjayanya. Menemui seseorang yang mahu membiayai projek terbarunya, dia pun mula mencari pelakon-pelakon untuk membintanginya. Pelbagai rintangan dihadapinya dalam mencari pelakon yang boleh meniru gaya seperti P.Ramlee.

programme.title: Ragam Pemandu
programme.desc: Pemandu yang setia dan tidak pernah mengeluh, Hamid tidak disukai oleh isteri tuannya, Rubiah. Tuannya, Rahim pula seorang yang baik hati dan sukakan Hamid. Dia sering membantu membiayai pelajaran anak-anak Hamid dan menyelesaikan masalah yang dihadapi olehnya. Satu pertengkaran menyebabkan Hamid berhenti kerja namun Rahim tampil membantu mengambilnya bekerja di syarikat insurans miliknya.

programme.title: Talak
programme.desc: Johan dan Liza sering bertengkar sehingga membawa kepada penceraian. Tetapi setiap kali ianya terjadi, mereka akan merujuk kembali. Tanpa disedari, Johan telah pun melafazkan talak kepada Liza sebanyak tiga kali, ini menyebabkan mereka tidak boleh merujuk kembali. Johan terpaksa mencari lelaki yang boleh dipercayai untuk berkahwin dengan Liza supaya mereka boleh kembali bersama. Namun, malang menimpa apabila lelaki untuk tidak mahu melepaskan Liza.

programme.title: Sikit Punya Gila
programme.desc: Hamid dan Dharma keluar merantau mencari kekayaan di bandar bertemu Nora dan Norlia. Hamid, penjual jagung rebus dan Dharma, penjaga lif tinggal di rumah milik pasangan suami isteri dan berjiran bersama Nora dan Norlia. Kerana ingin mencari kekayaan dengan menggunakan jalan mudah, pelbagai kesusahan terpaksa dihadapi oleh mereka berdua.

programme.title: Esok Masih Ada
programme.desc: Kematian satu-satunya anak miliknya akibat leukemia mengubah hidup seorang pegawai polis. ASP Zamri kemudiannya bertemu dengan Marina dan menjalinkan hubungan sulit bersamanya. Pelbagai halangan perlu dihadapinya oleh kerana kerjanya sebagai seorang pegawai polis. Akhirnya, Marina dan Zamri pun berkahwin dan dikurniakan anak - namun anak tersebut diserahkan kepada isteri pertama Zamri, Faridah untuk dijaga.

programme.title: Esok Untuk Siapa
programme.desc: Milah seorang peragawati yang bekerja di sebuah syarikat perusahaan batik milik Dato’ Iskandar. Dato’ Iskandar ingin menjodohkan Milah dengan anaknya, Ikhsan namun anaknya itu berkeras hati tidak mahu menurut kemahuan bapanya. Demi mengelakkan daripada menanggung malu, Milah bersetuju dinikahkan dengan Jiman, pengurus syarikat Dato’ Iskandar. Milah dan Jiman terlibat dalam satu kemalangan jalan raya sehingga mengakibatkan Jiman lumpuh dan mengalami kecederaan otak yang serius. Keadaan menjadi semakin teruk apabila Ikhsan memaksa Jiman untuk melepaskan Milah kerana dia ingin memperisterikan Milah.

programme.title: Langit Tidak Selalu Cerah
programme.desc: Huzaimah gilakan kemewahan dan darjat sehingga sanggup meninggalkan suami dan anaknya demi mengejar kesenangan dunia. Dia berjaya menjadi seorang penyanyi namun telah diperdaya oleh Jeff, lelaki yang dianggapnya sebagai kekasih ke kancah pelacuran. Sedar dan ingin memohon maaf ke suami dan anaknya, dia mula mencari mereka. Namun, kemaafan itu tidak tercapai kerana pintu hati yang sudah tertutup. Kemudian, satu insiden telah membuka semula pintu hati mereka untuk memaafkan Huzaimah yang sedang menghidap HIV.

programme.title: Pertentangan
programme.desc: Zainab dan Zabidi merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang dikurniakan dua orang anak lelaki. Zainab seorang isteri yang setia dan taat kepada perintah agama, namun suaminya gemar membuat maksiat. Mereka berpisah dan masing-masing mengambil seorang anak. Zabidi berkahwin dengan Farah dan menyerahkan anaknya itu kepada seorang kenalannya. Farah berlaku curang kepada Zabidi. Ketika Farah sedang keluar berfoya-foya di Singapura, Zabidi mengekorinya dan terlibat dalam satu kes pergaduhan sehingga dia dihukum penjara.

programme.title: Penghujung Malam
programme.desc: Razak yang telah merantau membawa diri setelah rumahtangganya runtuh kira-kira 15 tahun yang lalu telah kembali ke Malaysia. Niatnya hanya satu, mahu membina semula rumahtangganya dan memastikan anaknya Rita yang kini berusia 19 tahun dan merupakan seorang penyanyi terkenal mendapat kasih sayang seorang bapa. Malangnya, bekas isteri dan anaknya itu tidak mahu menerima Razak malah menaruh perasaan benci yang amat sangat terhadap dirinya.

programme.title: Senja Merah
programme.desc: Selepas kematian isteri tercinta, Mahmud, seorang hartawan telah berkahwin dengan Zubaidah, yang merupakan janda anak satu. Mahmud mempunyai seorang anak lelaki bernama Anuar dan anak angkat perempuan bernama Mira. Baharum, anak kepada Zubaidah berkawan baik dengan Mira. Apabila mereka meningkat dewasa, hubungan mereka bertambah erat dan saling mencintai antara satu sama lain. Anuar tidak senang dengan perhubungan itu kerana khuatir harta ayahnya akan jatuh ke tangan mereka berdua.

programme.title: Esok Untuk Siapa
programme.desc: Milah seorang peragawati yang bekerja di sebuah syarikat perusahaan batik milik Dato’ Iskandar. programme.title: Pening-Pening Lalat
programme.desc: Dino adalah banduan yang berjaya melarikan diri dari penjara. Polis menyiarkan berita mengenainya dan menawarkan hadiah RM10,000 kepada sesiapa yang berjaya menangkapnya. Jadi Dino bersembunyi di dalam hutan di mana dia bertemu Zakaria dan Aliza.

programme.title: Fighting Fish
programme.desc: Seorang lelaki yang juga seorang peninju berhijrah kesebuah negara lain untuk memulakan hidup baru . pada mulanya nasib tidak menyebelahi lelaki tersebut dan hidupnya berubah selepas menemui seorang rakan yang banyak membantu . setelah gagal mencari pekerjaan rakan lelaki itu mencadangkan dia menyertai liga muay thay secara kecil-kecilan .

programme.title: Debu Debu Kasih
programme.desc: Suzana berumur 23 tahun, mengikut kawan-kawannya ke Terengganu, untuk menghilangkan rasa sunyi. di terengganu suzana bertemu Hassan, terbitlah rasa cinta. oleh kerana salahfaham berlakulah pertengkaran antara Hassan dan Suzana.

programme.desc: Clarise mahukan suami oleh kerana desakan keluarga. Selepas kemalangan dia terjaga di sebuah pulau dengan Henry, yang mengalami amnesia. Dia mengambil kesempatan daripada situasi itu dan memperkenalkan dirinya sebagai isterinya.

Id ialah pengganti syarikat itu, baru pulang dari Jepun. Dia mencadangkan syarikat itu perlu membina mainan baru di sekitar model yang ditolak sebelum ini. Syarikat itu tidak dapat mencari pencipta, jadi mereka hanya mengeluarkannya. oleh kerana melihat rekaan mereka dicuri, merka merancang untuk membalas dendam.

programme.title: Sengketa Cinta
programme.desc: Seorang pemuda telah ditipu dalam perniagaan . Untuk membalas dendam dia mencolek seorang wanita dalam usaha untuk menjejak penipu itu. Bagaimanapun akhirnya dia jatuh cinta dengan wanita tersebut lalu membawa balik menemui ibubapanya.

programme.title: Purnama
programme.desc: Mengisahkan keadaan Kampung Cenderang yang menerima ancaman komunis selama 14 hari. Kisah bermula selepas Anum menjadi saksi pertama melihat mayat kakaknya, Salmah digantung di sebatang pokok tidak jauh dari kampung berkenaan.

programme.title: Janji Palsu Suamiku, Derita Buatku
programme.desc: Tomy melamar Alda dan menjanjikan akan merawat kebutuhan ibu dan adik calon istrinya. Setelah pernikahan, usaha Tomy mengalami penurunan dan ibunya menyalahkan Alda karena miskin dan tidak bisa membantu suaminya. Ketika usahanya mulai membaik, Tomy berselingkuh dengan mitra bisnisnya. Akankah Alda mampu menerima kenyataan ini?

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep135
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.

programme.title: D'Star Ep66
programme.desc: D'Star ialah pertandingan nyanyian berprestij di mana 30 penyanyi bersaing untuk menjadi All-Stars'. Penyanyi ini adalah dari D'Academy, Selebriti D'Academy, Liga Dangdut Indonesia, dan Bintang Pantura. Mereka akan mempersembahkan pelbagai genre muzik dan menunjukkan kemahiran mereka.

programme.title: Drama Musikal - Kawal Sampai Halal Ep2
programme.desc: Saksikan Drama Muzikal 'Kawal Sampai Halal' yang dibintangi oleh pasangan popular Lesti & Rizky Billar serta Rara & Gunawan. Turut menampilkan Beniqno, Erie Suzan, Jirayut, Reza, Fildan, Putri, Aulia, Meli, Hari, Faul, Randa, Ridwan, Nia, Ical, Gabriel Harvianto, Lilis, Wulan, Irwan, Weni, Aco, Janna, Abdel, Jarwo Kwat, dan hos bersama: Ramzi dan Irfan Hakim.

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep136

programme.title: Perjuangan Gadis Penjual Pecel Yang Terpaksa Tinggal Di Kandang Kambing
programme.desc: Putri membantu neneknya menjual pecel keliling setiap hari. Suatu hari, mereka diusir dari rumah kontrakannya karena tidak bisa membayar uang sewa. Akhirnya, Putri dan neneknya tinggal di sebuah gubuk yang berdekatan dengan kandang kambing.

programme.title: Konser Dari Rhoma untuk Irama
programme.desc: Konsert sambutan ulang tahun Rhoma Irama, Raja Dangdut!

programme.title: D'Star Ep67
programme.desc: D'Star ialah pertandingan nyanyian berprestij di mana 30 penyanyi bersaing untuk menjadi All-Stars'. Penyanyi ini adalah dari D'Academy, Selebriti D'Academy, Liga Dangdut Indonesia, dan Bintang Pantura. Mereka akan mempersembahkan pelbagai genre muzik dan menunjukkan kemahiran mereka.

programme.title: Calon Presiden Ep14
programme.desc: Impian tanpa sokongan orang tersayang adalah kosong. Pasangan suami isteri, Mustakim dan Rohmah sedang mengandung anak pertama. Semasa majlis meraikan anak dalam kandungan mereka, Mustakim dan Rohmah mengumumkan bahawa mereka mahu anak pertama mereka menjadi presiden suatu hari nanti. Kenyataan itu dipenuhi dengan pendapat berbeza; ada yang mengharapkan yang terbaik manakala ada yang berkata ia tidak masuk akal. Kisah ini bakal menggambarkan perjuangan keluarga tukang jahit yang berimpian besar untuk anak dalam kandungan.

programme.title: Buku Harian Seorang Istri Ep94
programme.desc: Nana dipaksa menikahi Dewa oleh ayahnya, Wawan. Kehidupan seharian Nana penuh dengan seksaan tanpa cinta dalam perkahwinan mereka. Sementara itu, Dewa yang mencintai Alya sejak awal, berkeras untuk mengekalkan hubungan mereka walaupun dia kini sudah berkahwin.

programme.title: Dewi Rindu Ep148
programme.desc: Dewi adalah seorang gadis yang mempunyai impian yang sangat besar. Dia berazam untuk menjadi seorang yang berjaya dan membawa keluarganya keluar dari kesempitan hidup. Namun siapa sangka, impian indahnya itu musnah malah terpaksa mengharungi realiti pahit iaitu hamil di luar nikah.

programme.title: Istri Yang Tidak Benar-Benar Dicintai Oleh Suaminya
programme.desc: Selepas kemalangan kereta itu, Citra menjadi buta. Dia dianggap tidak mampu melayani suaminya Johan, dan ibu mertuanya menekan Johan untuk berkahwin dengan Priska. Akankah Citra mampu bertahan atau akan berpisah dengan Johan?

programme.title: Suster El Ep8
programme.desc: Kisah seorang gadis yatim piatu bernama Elnara yang tinggal bersama kakaknya, Resti. Demi memenuhi impian Nara untuk menjadi jururawat, Resti bekerja keras. Hingga suatu hari, Resti bertemu dengan seorang lelaki kaya bernama Verdi dan mereka akhirnya menikah. Nara sangat gembira kerana perkahwinan Resti membawa kehidupan yang lebih baik untuk mereka, tetapi kegembiraan Nara berakhir seketika apabila dia menemui sesuatu yang menggoncangkan dunianya dan mengancam untuk memisahkan keluarganya.

programme.title: Bisik Sore Ep1

programme.title: Drama Musikal Adik Rambut Panjang

programme.title: Menebus Cinta dengan Air Mata
programme.desc: Malik rela membatalkan pertunangannya dengan Winy kerana Winy telah diterima bekerja yang melarang beliau mempunyai pasangan romantik. Bos Winy pula memanfaatkan dan menipu Malik demi memenangi hati Winy. Walau bagaimanapun, Malik tidak mudah menyerah dan terus berjuang secara rahsia untuk memperjuangkan hubungannya dengan Winy. Apa yang dilakukan Malik untuk memenangi kembali hati Winy?

programme.desc: Program infotainment yang menyajikan berita harian tentang selebriti Indonesia.

programme.desc: Sebuah program bual bicara yang dihoskan Tukul Arwana di Indosiar menyajikan hiburan terbaru yang akan menemani penonton semasa pandemik COVID-19 bersama bintang jemputan, tokoh masyarakat dan mereka yang tular di media sosial.

programme.title: The Merciless
programme.desc: A notorious gangster teams up with a prison newbie to take over the crime ring, yet the trust between shaken when their ulterior motives come to light.

programme.title: Meet The In-Laws
programme.desc: Hyun Joon and his girlfriend Da Hong are ready to tie the knot, but there's one big problem: Da Hong's father is strongly against him because of his hometown. Will they ever make it to the altar?

programme.title: The Face Reader
programme.desc: Nae-gyeong is the most skillful face reader in all of Joeson dynasty. After his abilities are acknowledged, he gets pulled into a royal power struggle involving the King's successor.

programme.title: Mission: Possible
programme.desc: A cash-strapped private investigator Woo Su-Han is retained by a secret agent Yoo Da-Hee to bring down a high risk arms trafficking operation.

programme.title: Fatal Intuition
programme.desc: A man tries to find the killer of his sister and seeks revenge by enlisting the help of a medium.

programme.title: The Beast
programme.desc: Two rival detectives compete against each other to catch the notorious killer who shakes up Korea by their gruesome murders.

programme.title: Marrying The Mafia 2: Enemy In Law
programme.desc: When In-Jae, the eldest son of a mafia family meets the beautiful Jin-Kyung, his mother is more than pleased but when they find out she is a prosecutor, it brings chaos to their family.

programme.title: We Are Brothers
programme.desc: Two brothers separated at birth reunite 30 years later and go on a road trip in search of their mom with Alzheimer's.

programme.title: Decibel
programme.desc: A former navy commander receives a threatening call who claims to blow up a stadium with a sound-responsive bomb. He must face the secret he left buried in the deep sea to track this terrorist down.

programme.title: Youngju
programme.desc: Young-Ju, barely 18 years old, works to support her younger brother after her parents died. She decides to meet the people responsible for her parents' deaths when she needs financial help.

programme.title: The Divine Move
programme.desc: Go player Tae Seok is framed and imprisoned for his brother's death after losing a high-stakes game. After his sentence, he sets out for revenge against the underground gambler who destroyed his life.

programme.title: Rough Cut
programme.desc: When a bad-boy movie star hires a real gangster to take on an opposing role to avoid a scandal after beating a fellow actor half to death, he gets more than he bargained for from this replacement.

programme.title: Soar Into The Sun
programme.desc: An elite combat pilot carries a rescue mission to his missing teammate while facing threats from the north.

programme.title: Life Is Beautiful
programme.desc: Se-yeon, devoted her entire life to her family, suddenly learns she is gravely ill. Now she is determined to live for herself more than ever and looks for her first love with the help of her husband.

programme.title: Miss Granny
programme.desc: Complications and hilarity ensues when a 70-year-old woman living unhappily with her son's family is magically restored to her beauty of 50 years earlier.

programme.title: Train To Busan
programme.desc: While a zombie-virus breaks out in South Korea, passengers including a father and young daughter, a couple, and several students struggle to survive on the train from Seoul to Busan.

programme.title: The Man From Nowhere
programme.desc: A quiet pawnshop keeper with a violent past takes on a drug-and-organ trafficking ring in hopes of saving the child who is his only friend.

programme.title: Salut D'Amour
programme.desc: Follow the heart-warming tale about a pair of elderly people who, with the support of family and friends, find love despite their failing minds and weakening bodies.

programme.title: Take Off
programme.desc: Rounding up five inexperienced athletes from a small Korean town with nothing to lose, they form the first Korean ski jump team in hope of winning gold.

programme.title: Mission: Possible
programme.desc: A cash-strapped private investigator Woo Su-Han is retained by a secret agent Yoo Da-Hee to bring down a high risk arms trafficking operation.

programme.title: The Tooth And The Nail
programme.desc: Based on the novel of the same name by Bill S. Ballinger, the story tells of a magician who plans the most elaborate trick in order to uncover the hidden conspiracy behind his fiance's death.

programme.title: Decibel
programme.desc: A former navy commander receives a threatening call who claims to blow up a stadium with a sound-responsive bomb. He must face the secret he left buried in the deep sea to track this terrorist down.

programme.title: Very Ordinary Couple
programme.desc: A couple working in the same bank broke up but continue to see each other in workplace. They couldn't help but pay attention to each other even more than they were dating...

programme.title: Queen Of Walking
programme.desc: A high school girl who has to walk for four hours to school everyday unexpectedly discovers her talent for walking and begins training as a speed walking athlete.

programme.title: Cadaver
programme.desc: 6 med students participate in their first anatomy class, yet nightmare begins when they are assigned with a deadly beautiful cadaver.

programme.title: Sunset In My Hometown
programme.desc: When an unsuccessful rapper returns to his hometown to visit his sick father, he reconnects with the friends and family he left behind long ago.

programme.title: Operation Chromite
programme.desc: "Operation Chromite" tells the true story of a General, who led the attack against the North Koreans in the Battle of Incheon, forcing them to retreat out of Seoul.

programme.title: Secret Zoo
programme.desc: Dreams of landing a permanent position at a top law firm, a lawyer takes on an unusual assignment of keeping an ownerless zoo running by convincing its employees to dress up as animals.

programme.title: The Outlaws
programme.desc: In order to maintain peace, a ruthless detective and his ragtag team plan to take down the most feared Chinese gangster in Seoul.

programme.desc: Ro-woom is a genius scam artist who lacks empathy, and Moo-young is an attorney who is excessively empathetic by nature. To battle evil, these two opposites team up to form an unlikely alliance.

programme.title: In the Family (T) Ep3738
programme.desc: "Home" as axis X and "love" as axis Y, this piece exquisitely depicts the ups and downs in life of an ordinary family. From touching sibling love, to the struggles and entanglement of parent-child relationship, the show elaborates on the importance of encountering the surroundings with a positive attitude. Through a bowl of beef noodle soup, Hui-wen and Chien-chin teach their four daughters, Spring, Summer, Fall, and Winter, how to behave around others. The heartwarming play is relaxing, fun, humorous, and a tearjerker.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep46454646
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2053
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3628
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2054
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Blessing of Formosa(T) Ep160
programme.desc: The beauty of folklore is all around us in Taiwan, but we often overlook it and fail to appreciate and feel it. The aim of this program is to promote the beauty of Taiwanese folklore and bring folklore to life. This program showcases folk culture regardless of race or religion, and presents travel information in a fun way, combining easy-to-understand folk culture knowledge with the mission of passing on folk culture. The audience can learn more about folk cultural products such as handicrafts, antiques, temple folklore, as well as short stories about the gods, and information about local tourism. It is an educational and entertaining way to travel and learn about folklore.

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep1044
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Have A Nice Dream (M) Ep102
programme.desc: Five young professionals with different life skills, team up for two days and one night trip, leading the audiance to explore the good life of nature and the beauty of the land of Taiwan.

programme.title: Way to Health(M) Ep219220
programme.desc: This show invites top medical professionals from different fields to answer questions from the audience. Approved by the medical world, this show is an influential, as well as reliable place to understand more about one’s health.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep452
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: The Wonder Woman(M) Ep1415
programme.desc: Be a "shark", if you're a woman, to survive in your working and personal relationship? DU,AI-SHA, also known as Shark, is aggressive and ruthless YI,FEI-YANG nickname is "Orca". Orcas kills sharks. That implies the relationship between them. They are friends and foes at the same time. They show no mercy and never surrender. Love comes and goes but friendship lasts forever. AI-SHA doesn't want to lose her best friend YI,FEI-YANG. She doesn't need love, but she needs him.

programme.title: New Police Story
programme.desc: Senior Inspector Wing is an elite in the police force but has been drowning his guilt in booze after his entire team was killed by the “Gang of Five” in a mission. A year later, a young rookie detective with a complicated background is assigned to partner Wing and manages to inspire him into action, as Wing vows to take down the gang.

programme.title: Mission Milano
programme.desc: A wealthy entrepreneur goes undercover with an Interpol agent to protect a new invention, the Seed of God, from falling into an international crime conglomerate.

programme.title: From Beijing With Love
programme.desc: Stephen Chow writes, directs & stars in this hilarious James Bond spoof that sees the Chinese government assign their worst secret agent (Chow) to recover a stolen dinosaur skull.

programme.title: Detective Dee and Nine-storey Demon Building
programme.desc: A series of strange incidents happen at the Tang’s demon building but Detective Dee finds no clue. Dee finds the master of the family suspicious when he speaks with him, and when the eldest daughter Miss Tang secretly informs Dee about Mr Tang’s strange behavior and the fact that she is kept under surveillance, Dee vows to unveil the truth.

programme.title: Table for Six
programme.desc: In this comedy, three brothers reside in a home inherited from their late parents. The eldest brother insists they have dinner at home every night as a family, but tensions begin to rise when their girlfriends join in as well. Love, friendship, jealousy and complicated relationships are all on the menu for this table for six!

programme.title: The Eagle Shooting Heroes
programme.desc: Executive produced by Wong Kar Wai, “The Eagle Shooting Heroes” is loosely based on Louis Cha’s classics. Whilst mistaken identity and rampant gender confusion are on the menu, Sammo Hung’s action direction and the incredible all-star casts also keep the laughs and thrills coming in this Hong Kong-style crazy comedy.

programme.title: Detective Vs. Sleuths
programme.desc: Hong Kong is rocked by a series of cold-blooded murders whose victims are runaway suspects of unsolved cases. The group of killers calls themselves “The Chosen Sleuths". Former top detective Lee vows to bring the brutal killers to justice and prove himself to be the real “Chosen Sleuth” instead of a lunatic.

programme.title: Come Back Home
programme.desc: In a chilly winter, De and his family goes on a self-drive tour to Changbai Mountain. The holiday turns tragic when De’s eight-year-old son goes missing. He seeks help from the local police but is unable to find his son. Though the golden hour has passed, De and the rescue team insist on continuing the search. Can they finally rescue the boy?

programme.title: The Calling of a Bus Driver
programme.desc: A girl named Suki fulfills her dream of being a bus driver after breaking up with her boyfriend, who has an affair with her good friend. When Suki is invited to attend her ex-boyfriend’s wedding, she is presented with a chance for revenge – will she take it and turn her life around?

programme.title: Flying Dragon Leaping Tiger
programme.desc: Lu the horse thief is betrayed by his best mate Qiao and is separated from his son. Lu’s wife blames him for it and takes Qiao’s daughter away as revenge. For 20 years, Lu searches for his wife until one day, his missing son meets Qiao’s daughter and they fall in love. Will their hatred pass on to the next generation?

programme.title: The Grand Grandmaster
programme.desc: Ma Fei Lung, a Chinese martial arts grandmaster, lost everything after he is floored by a former female boxing champion, Chan Tsang. The relevant video was posted on social media and he became the laughing stock of everyone. To reclaim his reputation, Fei Lung challenges Chan Tsang to a rematch. Who will be the winner?

programme.title: Kungfu Stuntmen
programme.desc: Hong Kong action cinema is famous for its real kung fu moves performed by a group called “Kung Fu Stuntmen”. This docu-film pays tribute to the generations of kung fu stuntmen, with the crew spending over two years digging archives and interviewing many talents, including the most prominent masters like Jackie Chan, Donnie Yen and Sammo Hung.

programme.title: Raging Fire
programme.desc: As the police sets to arrest a drug lord, a team of masked thugs steals the drugs and murders the cops. Inspector Bong is devastated to see the aftermath of the carnage and soon discovers that the killers are led by Ngo, a former fellow cop who was forced into a life of crime by him. As the two men meet again, it is time to settle the score…

programme.title: The Knight of Shadows: Between Yin and Yang
programme.desc: Pu Song Ling, a legendary demon hunter, is asked to investigate a case involving missing teenage village girls with disciple, Constable Yan Fei. The duo leads a group of little monsters to help with the investigation, and in their search for the truth, they accidentally discover a mysterious love between a knight and a female ghost.

programme.title: Operation Bangkok
programme.desc: A military veteran, Wu Wei and an undercover cop, Tian Ming lead a team to rescue the hostages captured by a band of thugs in an island outside of Bangkok. As they are about to leave after the rescue, Wu finds that his daughter is also kidnapped, and decides to stay on with Ming to fight the thugs and save her.

programme.title: From Vegas To Macau
programme.desc: Chow Yun Fat stars as "Magic Hands" Ken, a legendary gambling maestro who is forced out of retirement when his daughter's safety is compromised by an international gambling mafia. In order to save her, Ken and his new protégé Cool must work together to expose the evil mastermind by challenging him to a high stakes head-to-head battle of cards.

programme.title: I Love You, You're Perfect, Now Change!
programme.desc: Catch this comedy-musical adapted from the Broadway classic I LOVE YOU, YOU’RE PERFECT, NOW CHANGE – consisting of 12 independent stories from the viewpoints of individuals, families and societies all exploring the timeless theme of love!

programme.title: New Kung Fu Cult Master 1
programme.desc: Wu Dang Sect’s Zhang Chui Shan’s son, Zhang Wu Ji, finds himself accidentally embroiled in the fight for the Dragon Sabre. When he unwittingly learns the powerful martial arts skills from the Jiuyin scriptures, Wu Ji proceeds to help the Six Major sects fight against the corrupt government.

programme.title: The Grandmaster
programme.desc: Directed by the acclaimed filmmaker Wong Kar Wai, this epic action feature begins in Foshan when Ip Man, the martial arts master from the south, takes up a challenge by ageing northern master Gong Yu Tian. Ip Man wins the fight, but is then defeated by Gong Yu Tian’s daughter Gong Er, with whom he forms an emotional bond…

programme.title: Life Must Go On
programme.desc: When the “midnight gymnasium” programme for wayward teenage girls is at funding risk, social worker Yanki puts together a dodgeball team to compete in a match and save it. With an ex-star athlete John as the coach, the girls realize they must face their problems and overcome their challenges instead of dodging them. Can they finally win the match?

programme.title: A Beautiful Moment
programme.desc: An ageing bachelor finally meets the girl of his dreams and proposes marriage, only to discover her psychologist stepmom was his first love long ago. The future in-laws initially pretend not to know each other but as the wedding date gets nearer, the rekindling of long-dormant feelings develops into a cross-generational love triangle.

programme.title: Young and Dangerous: Reloaded
programme.desc: In this remake of “Young and Dangerous”, Chan Ho Nam and his three buddies of the Hung Hing triad gang strive to fight for their own justice, further expanding their power in the triad and becoming a new legend...

programme.title: Love is Cold
programme.desc: In the mid-1990s in Macau, a teenage boy and girl kill someone and clean up the crime scene together. The girl is from China and is bullied in her new school. The boy is from a complicated family who has close ties to the gangster world. They are instantly attracted to each other when they met but who did they kill and will they get away with it?

programme.title: All's Well End's Well 2011
programme.desc: Popular make-up artist Sammy is hired as the CEO of a cosmetics company with all women staff. As he is clueless with women, he invites Arnold, a fellow make-up artist, to join and help him. Though Arnold might appear to be a woman's magnet, his heart still lingers with his first love, Mona.

programme.title: Kung Fu Fighter
programme.desc: Ma goes in search of his father in Shanghai. Inheriting his father’s physical strength, Ma gets hired by a boxing club and befriends Fatty. As a result of Fatty using fake notes to bet at the triad’s boxing club, both of them are hunted down by the gangsters. Luckily they are saved by some martial arts masters but the fight has only just begun.

programme.title: A Better Tomorrow 2018
programme.desc: In this remake of John Woo's legendary heroic bloodshed movie, a former drug smuggler attempts to start his life anew and repair his relationship with his estranged brother, who is a rising star in the Police Narcotics Division.

programme.title: Mr & Mrs Gambler
programme.desc: Manfred and Flora are gambling addicts who have come across each other a few times at the casino, but do not leave impression on each other until they both suffer heavy losses and are held hostage by the loan sharks in Macau. They find themselves falling in love, and decide to get married when they come back to Hong Kong.

programme.title: Somewhere Winter
programme.desc: The film follows the love story of a university student, An Ran and a Taiwanese man, Qi Xiao. They met and fell in love at a concert by Chyi Chin, a Taiwanese singer, in Beijing in 1991. However, courage alone may not be enough for the lovers to stay together, and goodbyes may truly mean the end. Will An Ran and Qi Xiao meet again in 2019?

programme.title: Trivisa
programme.desc: In the beginning of 1997, Hong Kong's three notorious thieves who have never met one another before appear in the same restaurant. This leads to a rumour that they are joining forces to pull off something big before the Handover, though this is not something that any of them is aware of.

programme.title: Cold War 2
programme.desc: Sean Lau is now the Police Commissioner after the successful rescue operation Cold War. However, the culprits from the past not only dodged justice but even escalated their actions and kidnapped Lau’s wife. He breaks every protocol to get her back, which puts him under investigation.

programme.title: Dragon Master: Dragon Spell
programme.desc: The Dragon King is locked in a seal by the Dragon Master for 500 years, and his daughter must travel back in time to 500 years ago to kill the Dragon Master, in order to reverse the act. Little did she know that the Dragon King and Dragon Master were close friends back then…

Chow Mo Wan encounters many women in his life but is touched by none after he lost his true love. Following an encounter one day, he decides to write a fiction titled “2046” which takes place at Room 2046. Nothing ever changes at Room 2046, and people go there to find their lost memories.

programme.title: Killers Five
programme.desc: The Duke’s daughter has been kidnapped by the notorious Golden Dragon Hill bandits. A swordman named Yue Zhen Bei is assigned to save her, and expecting many dangers on the journey, Yue garners help from a group of good friends who are also kung fu masters.

programme.title: The Lotus Lamp
programme.desc: Linda Lin Dai plays both mother and son in this lavish fable about a goddess who falls in love with a mortal scholar (Cheng Pei-pei in her debut role). Over two years in production, it was released on the first anniversary of Linda's tragic suicide.

programme.title: The Twin Swords
programme.desc: Wang Yu plays Kwei Wu, who stumbles onto a kidnapping with his wife Kan Lien-chu (Chin Ping) at the Red Lotus Temple. Kan sends Kwei to go for reinforcements while she stays to fight the kidnappers, but she is captured and imprisoned in an iron cage. As Kwei returns with reinforcements, he must also race to the temple to save his wife.

programme.title: The Younger Generation
programme.desc: A tragic tale about a young girl who gets married and has five kids. When she and her husband die, leaving all five kids behind to fend for themselves, the eldest child is forced to be sold into prostitution to feed the other four.

programme.title: Killer Darts
programme.desc: A group of bandits raided the village where dart master Liu lives and killed his wife. While hunting them down, Liu’s disciple kills a farmer and his wife when she refuses his advances, leading Liu to adopt their orphaned daughter and raises her with his son. Years later, the daughter meets a man with the bandits and is tricked to go against Liu.

programme.title: The Three Smiles
programme.desc: A talented scholar, Bo Hu, is attracted by the pretty maid, Qiu Xiang. In order to get close to her and win her love, he disguises as a servant to work in the same household. Qiu Xiang does not believe Bo Hu when he discloses his true identity to her, only falling in love with him when he reveals his talents and with his friends’ help.

programme.title: Six Assassins
programme.desc: Lord Li Ming is a feudal tyrant who oppresses the people, and even the Emperor who is his brother, cannot stop his evil act. Righteous swordsman Mu poses as Li Ming’s guard to plan for his assassination. He arrests six assassins who have tried to kill Li Ming, before making them his allies in a secret plot to kill him and end the tyranny.

programme.title: Inside The Forbidden City
programme.desc: Justice Bao discovers that Consort Li’s new born son was swapped at birth and that she was expelled from the palace by Empress Liu twenty years ago. He sets Eunuch Guo up to confess his conspiracy with the Empress. Empress Liu is convicted for her act and Consort Li finally reunites with her son who is now the Emperor.

programme.title: Death Duel
programme.desc: Third Master is a renowned swordsman in the martial arts world, but the constant challenges by other swordsmen compel him to fake his death and pursue a secluded life. This does not prevent others from seeking him out to challenge him however, and he is forced to return to fight his way till the end.

programme.title: Tropicana Interlude
programme.desc: Ping and Su are lovers who operate a travel agency specializing in Southeast Asian holidays. Tung, a school mistress, and her students join a guided tour lead by Ping. During the trip, a spoiled kid Li is attracted to Ping but Su thinks Ping has fallen for Tung and leaves. How will Ping deal with the situation and ends up happily back with Su?

programme.title: The Sentimental Swordsman
programme.desc: Li Xun Huan is a sentimental swordsman who has lived peacefully outside the martial arts world for the past 10 years. He returns home after knowing that the Plum Blossom Bandit is back to his old tricks, only to find that everything has changed.

programme.title: The Battle Wizard
programme.desc: Dali Prince Tuan Yu knows nothing about martial arts, but leaves the palace for the martial arts world. He meets a snake sorceress and his mysterious half-sister. Through various misadventures, Tuan Yu gains invincible power by sucking the cobra’s blood and swallowing the magic toad, eventually defeating his father’s old rival.

programme.title: Godfather Of Canton
programme.desc: A docker, Lin Si Hai, accidentally saves Commissioner Cheng who then offers him a position in the police force. Lin is smart and soon rises through the ranks through treachery and corruption, before becoming a gangster.

programme.title: Madam White Snake
programme.desc: Linda Lin Dai is perfect as Pak Su-cheng, the stunning snake goddess who assumes a womanly form so that she can taste the pleasures of a human life! Pak seduces young scholar, Hsu Hsien when she recognises him as her saviour in another life 1,000 years ago. But when Buddhist monk Fa Hai finds out about the union, the pair is forced to split...

programme.title: The Master
programme.desc: Gao Jian is the disciple of the martial arts master Shi but is constantly being punished by his master for no reason. One day, Gao accidentally saves his master’s rival Jin, so Jin teaches him his unique martial arts skill in return. However, Master Shi sees this as Gao’s betrayal…

programme.title: Love Without End
programme.desc: Singer Qing Qing and architect Tang Peng Nan are a sweet couple. Qing Qing sacrifices herself to help Peng Nan at a time when his family is going through difficulties and is misunderstood by Peng Nan, leading to their break up. When Peng Nan learns the truth and decides to make up with Qing Qing, he found that she is suffering from a terminal illness.

programme.title: The Eunuch
programme.desc: A year before Lo Wei directed Bruce Lee in Fist Of Fury, he wrote and co-starred in this tale of a treacherous devil who wants nothing less than supreme power...and doesn't care if he has to murder the Emperor and use his own daughter as a deadly dupe to get it.

programme.title: The Purple Shell
programme.desc: Hui and Ha are stuck in their unhappy marriages and are attracted to each other when they meet at a party. In one of their beach strolls, Ha picks up a purple shell and gives it to Hui as a memento. When Hui’s husband finds out about them, he hurts Hui and cause her to become seriously ill, while also blackmails Ha. How will this love story end?

programme.title: Brave Archer And His Mate
programme.desc: Guo Jing and Huang Rong raise the son of his sworn brother Yang Kang and named him Yang Guo. To prevent Yang Guo from taking revenge for his father’s death, Huang Rong bans him from learning martial arts. Yang Guo runs away from home in anger and encounters Ouyang Feng, who teaches him the “Toad Stance” and accidentally unveils his true identity…

programme.title: The Venus' Tear Diamond
programme.desc: Legendary rival jewel thieves Fragrant Night and Nocturnal Earl travel to Japan to steal the famous Venus’ Tear Diamond. They fall quickly in love at first sight, without knowing the other person is their rival and is after the same prize. Who will get the diamond, and will it mean the end of their new found love?

programme.title: Murder Plot
programme.desc: Martial artist Shen Lang is in discussions with kung fu experts from the other six sects to plot the downfall of the traitorous Happy King when his fiancée suddenly disrupts them and Shen has to quickly bring her away. As they continue to pursue the Happy King, both Shen and his fiancée accidentally fall into a trap set up by the King.

programme.title: Moods Of Love
programme.desc: This Song Dynasty period piece about how far one would go for love (or lust) has two tales. The first involves a devilish magistrate who tries to tempt a Buddhist monk out of his self-professed celibacy by hiring a pretty prostitute. The second is the tragic tale of an exploited young girl who is forced to work in an unscrupulous couple’s brothel.

programme.title: Five Elements Ninjas
programme.desc: The film is about a Chinese martial arts school finds itself outclassed by their rivals, they hire elite ninja from Japan to destroy the school. The lone survivor of the massacre learns the secrets of ninjutsu and seeks revenge against the ninja.

programme.title: The Grand Substitution
programme.desc: In this Opera epic, a loyal Imperial Court servant gives up his own newborn son to save the prince from an evil official.

programme.title: The Twin Bracelets
programme.desc: Two teenage girls make a pledge to look after each other in a small Chinese fishing town, where the notions of women's rights or sexual freedom are absent. One ends up happily married to a stranger, while the other is cruelly betrothed to the abusive son of a wealthy family and has to seek to free herself from the situation.

programme.title: Super Inframan
programme.desc: Transformed from a young laboratory researcher, the thunderbolt-fisted Inframan must battle Princess Dragon Mom who wakes up from hibernation to conquer the earth with her army of mutant monsters.

programme.title: Four Riders
programme.desc: Four martial arts experts live in Seoul after the Korean War in the 1950s. One of them inexplicably crosses path with a drug trafficking syndicate, and his three friends have no choice but to fight a brutal battle on his side...

programme.title: River Of Tears
programme.desc: Retired singer Fang lives happily with her husband and son. Tragedy happens when a man from her past returns to haunt her. In an ensuing struggle to free her from his clutches, her husband dies in a car accident. Blamed by her father-in-law for her husband’s death, Fang gets chased out of the house and goes back to singing to make a living...

programme.title: The Heroic Ones
programme.desc: The story is set in the Tang Dynasty and David Chiang plays the 13th Prince, a powerful fighter whose prestigious status provokes jealously, leading to a gruesome family feud.

programme.title: The Voyage Of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung continues his incognito voyage to southern China. Accompanied by the minister and the imperial scholar, they have many amusing encounters in Yangzhou.

programme.title: The Casino
programme.desc: After being separated for many years, two childhood lovers meet in a possibly mythical "Lucky Casino" and vow to rid the establishment of the corrupt military generals, criminals and extortionists!

programme.title: Beyond The Great Wall
programme.desc: Wang Zhao Jun refuses to bribe the imperial painter, so he draws an ugly portrait of her, preventing her from being selected by the Emperor until they meet in person. The painter ends up in exile and plots for Wang to marry the Hun’s warlord as a revenge. The Emperor rejects this, provoking a war which is only averted when Wang sacrifices herself.

programme.title: Descendant Of The Sun
programme.desc: Shi Sheng is adopted by an old carpenter and grows up to possess extraordinary superpowers. One day, he unexpectedly discovers his identity as the son of the solar deity and learns that his power will be lost during solar eclipse. When an evil spirit appears and wreaks havoc, Shi Sheng must beat him in an ultimate duel to save the world.

programme.title: Rose, Be My Love
programme.desc: Not a love triangle but a love 'rectangle', Rose, Be My Love is a romantic drama set on the eve of World War II that represents the high standards achieved by Shaw Brothers in both aspects of star power and technical polish.

programme.title: The 14 Amazons
programme.desc: The Yang family had served their country in Song Dynasty for generations. When General Yang is ambushed and killed during the war in Jin Shan, the grand matriarch led the entire family to take revenge and defend the country.

programme.title: Marma Bhoomi
programme.desc: Mystery thriller film starring Sumanth and Eesha Rebba

programme.title: Kappal
programme.desc: Tamil Comedy Film, Vaibhav Reddy, Sonam Bajwa, Karunakaran, VTV Ganesh & Others

programme.title: Karnan
programme.desc: Tamil Action Drama Film, Starring, Dhanush, Lal, Rajisha Vijayan, Yogi Babu

programme.title: Samar
programme.desc: Tamil mystery thriller film, Starring, Vishal, Trisha Krishnan, Sunaina, Jayaprakash & Others

programme.title: Irumugan
programme.desc: Irumugan features Actor Vikram, Actress Nayanthara & Actress Nithya Menon. Iru Mugan is a science fiction action thriller film written and directed by Anand Shankar. The story revolves around a RAW agent couple (Vikram & Nayantara) and an evil minded scientist named Love. One of the Blockbuster Hit movie in 2016

programme.title: Raja Manthiri
programme.desc: Raja Manthiri is a drama genre film written and directed by Usha Krishnan and produced by P. G. Muthiah. The film stars Kalaiyarasan, Kaali Venkat, Shaalin Zoya and Vaishali in the leading roles. Featuring music composed by Justin Prabhakaran

programme.desc: Klemen adores his older brother, Peter. When Peter becomes distracted with his affair with the beautiful Sonja, Klemen is angry that he’s been cast aside. At the same time, he struggles to ignore his growing obsession with Sonja’s feminine sensuality.

With the support of his family and his loyal girlfriend, Trixie, Speed teams with his one-time rival – the mysterious Racer X – to win the race that took his brother, Rex Racer's, life: the death-defying, cross-country rally known as The Crucible.

programme.title: The Informant!
programme.desc: What was Mark Whitacre thinking? A rising star at agri-industry giant Archer Daniels Midland (ADM), Whitacre suddenly turns whistleblower. Even as he exposes his company's multi-national price-fixing conspiracy to the FBI, Whitacre envisions himself being hailed as a hero of the common man and handed a promotion. But before all that can happen, the FBI needs evidence, so Whitacre eagerly agrees to wear a wire and carry a hidden tape recorder in his briefcase, imagining himself as a kind of de facto secret agent. Unfortunately for the FBI, their lead witness hasn't been quite so forthcoming about helping himself to the corporate coffers. Whitacre's ever-changing account frustrates the agents and threatens the case against ADM as it becomes almost impossible to decipher what is real and what is the product of Whitacre's rambling imagination. Based on the true story of the highest-ranking corporate whistleblower in U.S. history.

programme.title: Syriana
programme.desc: Syriana: noun a geographical term referring to those Middle East hot spots that have proven volatile with regard to the security of the United States; a place in the Middle East where trouble is always breaking out. Based on the best-selling book See No Evil: The True Story of a Ground Soldier in the CIA's War on Terrorism by Robert Baer, this timely political thriller takes a penetrating look at the efforts of the U.S. intelligence-gathering community in the Middle East, weaving together several storylines ranging from American foreign policy and the CIA's role in it to the oil industry and terrorism. Welcome to Syriana.

programme.title: Music And Lyrics
programme.desc: Hugh Grant and Drew Barrymore star as washed-up '80s pop star with a chance for a comeback and his quirky plant lady with a knack for lyrics. Alex Fletcher (Grant--Two Weeks Notice) has been reduced to working the nostalgia circuit at county fairs and amusement parks. The charismatic and talented musician gets a chance at a comeback when reigning pop diva Cora Corman (Haley Bennett) invites him to write and record a duet with her, but there's a problem--Alex hasn't written a song in years; he's never written lyrics . . . and he has to come up with a hit in a matter of days. Enter Sophie Fisher (Barrymore--Lucky You), Alex's beguilingly plant lady, whose flair for words strikes a chord with the struggling songwriter. On the rebound from a bad relationship with the newly famous novelist Sloan Cates (Campbell Scott--Duma), Sophie is reluctant to collaborate with anyone, especially commitment-phobe Alex. Now, Alex and Sophie will have to face their fears--and the music--to find the love and success they both deserve. Written and directed by Marc Lawrence, the writer of the Miss Congeniality films and the writer/director of Two Weeks Notice.

A new nurse (Elaine Joyce), on staff for the cruise, is a pretty ex-showgirl. Of course, Doc (Bernie Kopell) is hitting on her, and is a bit frustrated, when she does not return his advances.

programme.title: Clean
programme.desc: Tormented by his criminal past, Clean attempts a quiet life caring for his community and as a mentor to his young neighbor Dianda When local gang violence puts his neighbor’s life in danger, Clean finds himself returning to his violent past

programme.title: The Ninth Gate
programme.desc: Dean Corso is a rare book dealer with a taste for the finer things in life. When he is tasked with hunting down a dangerous sorcery book, he finds himself caught up in the chilling world of black magic, where he soon realizes he is out of his depth.

programme.title: Deadly Dormitory
programme.desc: When a University student refuses to sleep with her professor in exchange for good grades, she’s in danger of being killed to keep her quiet, and her mother must drop everything to save her.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: Return to the Wild 3 S3 Ep4
programme.desc: Australia - Ben Fogle returns to the Australian outback to revisit Barbara Walker, who has been living alone in a remote site for sixteen years.

programme.title: Spy in the Ocean 1 S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Deep Feelings - The spies seek out proof of emotions in the animals and fish they interact with. Spy dolphin tries to keep up with real dolphins as they play in the surf; spy sperm whale sees a calf's mother's loving bond; spy cuttlefish discovers that male cuttlefish can be very jealous and spy seal helps a lonely seal pup to join the older pups in play.

programme.desc: Chairs - Gregg Wallace and the team look inside a furniture factory making chair, following it from carving wood to making the finish product.

programme.title: Wild Oman: Wonder of Arabia 1 S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Sultanate of Oman is Arabia's most remarkable treasure. It is a land of surprising beauty filled with unexpected natural wonders, home to some of the rarest animals on Earth - the Arabian Leopard, Arabian Oryx, Green and Hawksbill Turtles - and many more creatures including Arabian Fox, Striped Hyena, Whale Sharks and other sea creatures. Oman's landscape is as diverse as the variety of unique creatures that it supports.

programme.title: South Korea with Alexander Armstrong 1 S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Arriving late at night in bustling downtown Seoul, Alexander kicks off his epic Korean adventure in Gangnam, the fabled district immortalised by Psy's Gangnam Style video - the most viewed song on YouTube.

programme.title: Spectacular Earth 1 S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Lightning - In Arizona, lightning strikes from so high above the ground, through such clear air, that it creates the perfect conditions for the most electrifying show on Earth.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Winter - Be an eyewitness to the death and resurrection that winter brings to Africa. Observe what comes with shorter days, from drought conditions to frigid winds, and marvel at the survival skills of animals and plants as they face the season’s fury.

programme.title: The Living Beach 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Mexico - The mythology of Mexico’s Yucatan Peninsula includes a protective Earth Mother figure, “Ixchel,” who brings fertility and healing to the region. In the shadow of Ixchel, we witness an ancient birthing ritual happening yearly on Mexican beaches: mother green sea turtles haul themselves onto the sands and bury their clutches of eggs.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Young Ones - In this episode of Amazing Animal Friends a rescued orphaned rhino befriended by a playful dog and doting sheep, a big bunny rabbit that babysits boisterous baby lambs, and a porcupine that helps two English bulldogs rehabilitate injured animals.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 Ep1
programme.desc: How to Catch a Lizard - Tag along as Dr. Amanda rescues a blind pet baboon, and watch Dr. Charlotte’s tricky surgery on a pangolin whose leg must be amputated after a run-in with poachers. Later, chase a rhino, two young baboons gone AWOL, and a fiesty monitor lizard.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 Ep2
programme.desc: An Island Home - Face a tough decision when Esti’s leg infection puts the brakes on this young duiker’s release. Then track and collar a young lion with Dr. Amanda; check on an ailing bush baby; and greet the noisy new addition to the center, a grumpy grey parrot.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 Ep6
programme.desc: City - It’s Halifax through the eyes of its wildest residents. During the day, squirrels and chipmunks compete for territory in the city park. At night, Halifax’s raccoons invade backyards and seagulls scour the streets for pizza.

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Change in the Air - Watch life on the farm adjust as the leaves start to turn, from the sheep whose woolly coats keep them warm during the first frost to the bees that feed on the last bit of nectar before hibernation.

programme.title: Into the Wild Colombia 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Romeo and Julieta - This is the story of Julieta, a female golden dart frog, in search of her Romeo. She’s about to lay her eggs and must find a male to fertilize them. Romeo’s calls guide her through the forest, but crossing the dense rainforest is no easy feat.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Autumn - Autumn in Africa brings opportunities. Cape Fur seals, Samango monkeys, chameleons, impala, and more respond to the season. Autumn triggers changes in the lives of many animals. Rare creatures reveal themselves and predators gather to take advantage.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year 1 Ep4

programme.desc: An Island Home - Face a tough decision when Esti’s leg infection puts the brakes on this young duiker’s release. Then track and collar a young lion with Dr. Amanda; check on an ailing bush baby; and greet the noisy new addition to the center, a grumpy grey parrot.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 Ep8
programme.desc: Wetlands - Wild Wild East’s wetland habitats are at risk. These marshes and bogs are the ancient home of the endangered Blanding’s Turtle. But each fall new turtles spring from the lake shores of Nova Scotia. If the vulnerable Blanding’s can make it through their first few years of life, they'll live for almost a century. But saving the turtle means protecting the wetlands, and all the other amphibians and reptiles that call the slow-moving waters home.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 Ep9
programme.desc: Crustaceans - The relationships between species like lobsters, scallops and crabs are numerous and complicated. Changing water temperature is bringing invasive species to the Wild Wild East, putting pressure on the species humans count on for important commercial harvests.

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Hunkering Down - Winter is coming, and the animals take advantage of autumn’s final bounty before the cold, barren months ahead. Watch some creatures search for respite indoors, while others arrive from far northern climates to settle in the ploughed fields.

programme.title: Coastal Africa 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Sweeping Shores - The African intertidal zone is home to a unique universe of plants and creatures. Here, life has adapted to survive in a challenging marine environment - some species are able to live on exposed rocks, while others prefer the shelter of rock pools.

programme.title: The Living Beach 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Hawaii - Throughout the Hawaiian Islands, natural forces of creation and destruction can be observed in real-time as they work to shape the living beach. These beaches are forged inside active volcanoes: every bit of land exists here because of these red-hot furnaces.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Beast Buddies - Meet more Amazing Animal Friends, an animal shelter puppy that helps a captive cheetah cub get ready for the wild, and an injured monkey who wins over a pack of unfriendly dogs and a lonely mongoose that enjoys foraging with a flock of sheep.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 Ep1
programme.desc: How to Catch a Lizard - Tag along as Dr. Amanda rescues a blind pet baboon, and watch Dr. Charlotte’s tricky surgery on a pangolin whose leg must be amputated after a run-in with poachers. Later, chase a rhino, two young baboons gone AWOL, and a fiesty monitor lizard.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 Ep3
programme.desc: Dora the Baby Muriqui - Feel the enchantment of Brazil’s Atlantic Forest as southern muriqui Dora takes her first steps away from mum Mimi. Get lessons in spider monkey troop dynamics, bone up on tail-hanging technique, and see this baby find her place among her peers.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 Ep4
programme.desc: Thiago the Coati Kitten - Set a course for adventure with Thiago, a brave baby coati. Find out how this raccoon-like fellow sharpens his sniffing and foraging skills, crosses suburban roads near his lush Brazilian forest home, and avoids inanimate and four-legged dangers.

programme.desc: Beast Buddies - Meet more Amazing Animal Friends, an animal shelter puppy that helps a captive cheetah cub get ready for the wild, and an injured monkey who wins over a pack of unfriendly dogs and a lonely mongoose that enjoys foraging with a flock of sheep.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 Ep3
programme.desc: Dora the Baby Muriqui - Feel the enchantment of Brazil’s Atlantic Forest as southern muriqui Dora takes her first steps away from mum Mimi. Get lessons in spider monkey troop dynamics, bone up on tail-hanging technique, and see this baby find her place among her peers.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 Ep4
programme.desc: Thiago the Coati Kitten - Set a course for adventure with Thiago, a brave baby coati. Find out how this raccoon-like fellow sharpens his sniffing and foraging skills, crosses suburban roads near his lush Brazilian forest home, and avoids inanimate and four-legged dangers.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 Ep10
programme.desc: Horses of St. Pierre & Miquelon - In the Northern Atlantic, cold Canadian waters surround eight European Islands. This is the last remaining overseas territory of France, and the summer-home to a semi-feral population of horses and ponies. Wild Wild East infiltrates the herd to explore the politics and power of horses. Meanwhile, in the waters surrounding the French archipelago, the once-vast stocks of cod fish are disappearing, changing life above the surface for humans and horses.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 Ep11
programme.desc: Invasion - Non-native species have made their way into the Wild Wild East and staked their claim to the jagged coast. At White Point Beach Resort in Liverpool, Nova Scotia bunnies have hopped on in for an extended holiday. It’s turf wars between the beachcombers and the chalets dwellers. Meanwhile, the starling population is beginning to rival gulls and pigeons.

programme.title: Wildlife Icons 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Africa's Big Cats - South Africa’s Kruger National Park is one of the largest game reserves on the continent. It contains diverse habitats and is home to hundreds of species of mammals, birds, and reptiles This abundance of animals means many predators, including Africa’s big cats.

programme.title: Wildlife Icons 1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Big 5 - From their time as dangerous adversaries to colonialist hunters, who coined the term “the big five,” to the ever-present and considerable challenges of daily life, for the lion, African elephant, leopard, buffalo, and rhino, life isn’t easy when you’re big in the wild.

programme.title: Africa's Claws & Jaws 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Remarkable Reptiles - Africa - a continent teeming with life. While its animal aristocrats are the most familiar, lurking in the shadows is a diversity of reptiles. They’ve conquered just about every habitat and have evolved a remarkable array of adaptations that make them the undisputed masters of the underworld.

programme.title: Africa's Claws & Jaws 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Living with Sharks - Sharks are among the planet’s oldest and most highly evolved predators. Along southern Africa’s coast, pioneers dedicate their lives to learning more about these creatures, and spreading awareness about their plight. These people do all they can to find safe ways of living with sharks.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Snares Islands/ Tini Heke - Venture to the pristine wilderness of the Snares Islands, a remote animal sanctuary protected from the turbulent sea. Hop along with a colony of Snares crested penguins, soar with giant petrels and sooty shearwaters, and roar with giant sea lions.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Otago Peninsula/ Muaupoko - Set sail for New Zealand’s Otago Peninsula, a breeding refuge for endangered seabirds and marine mammals. Watch as sea lions, albatrosses, red-billed gulls, white-fronted terns, and fairy prions find mates, then nurture the next generation.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Top of the South/ Te Tau Ihu - Uncover a land of opposites atop New Zealand’s South Island, where one of the world’s longest sandbars attracts bar-tailed godwits and hungry pilot whales, and drowned river valleys provide a buffet for dusky dolphins and New Zealand fur seals.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Hauraki Gulf/ Te Moananui a Toi - Take a deep dive into the teeming waters of the Hauraki Gulf, near Auckland, New Zealand, and explore a true paradise for ocean creatures. Catch a glimpse of a stealthy manta ray, enjoy dolphin antics, and admire a kaleidoscope of tropical fish.

programme.title: The Living Beach 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Australia - It’s a UNESCO World Heritage Site, the largest sand island on earth, and home to wild dingoes, six-foot sand-worms, and eucalyptus woodlands. Find out how everything lives happily together in a complex ecosystem built entirely upon sand.

programme.title: The Living Beach 1 Ep6
programme.desc: California - The beaches of California are some of the most beautiful in the world, but are they falling out of balance due to mankind’s effects on nature? What does it take for the magnificent fauna of the Pacific Coast to keep living… on the “living beach”?

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 Ep10
programme.desc: Horses of St. Pierre & Miquelon - In the Northern Atlantic, cold Canadian waters surround eight European Islands. This is the last remaining overseas territory of France, and the summer-home to a semi-feral population of horses and ponies. Wild Wild East infiltrates the herd to explore the politics and power of horses. Meanwhile, in the waters surrounding the French archipelago, the once-vast stocks of cod fish are disappearing, changing life above the surface for humans and horses.

programme.title: The Great Elephant Tale
programme.desc: The Great Elephant Tale - Follow the adventures of three elephants across three very distinct African habitats. Their travels combine to tell the story of how these emotional and intelligent creatures evolved over millions of years to survive on the continent.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Horizons 1 Ep5
programme.desc: The Kalahari - An immense, dry land dominates southwestern Africa. Here, sand covers the land in rippling dunes and rain drains away as quickly as it falls. Kalahari, meaning "place of great thirst," is an appropriate name for one of southern Africa’s greatest wildernesses.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 Ep3

programme.title: Simply Italian S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Ravioli in Uovo, Pappardelle, Beetroot Pasta, Tortelli - Michela heads to Italy to cook up ravioli, pappardelle, beetroot pasta and tortelli.

programme.desc: Graham is joined by actors Cate Blanchett and Margot Robbie, comedian Alan Carr and dancer Ashley Banjo. With music from RAYE, who performs her single Thrill Is Gone.

programme.title: Jamie's Easy Meals for Every Day S1 Ep19
programme.desc: Today Jamie's quick and easy recipes include Cod, asparagus, and an avocado hollandaise, as well as a fabulous pizza.

programme.title: Jamie's Easy Meals for Every Day S1 Ep20
programme.desc: Today Jamie's recipes include a tray-bake chicken jalfrezi, and a Broccoli Pierogi.

programme.title: Your Home, Made Perfect S3 Ep5
programme.desc: Jacqueline and Jamie - Architects Lizzie Fraher and Julian McIntosh compete using virtual reality to remodel a London home. Will the finished build fulfil the dreams of the mother and son who share it?

programme.title: Junior Bake Off S6 Ep11
programme.desc: It's finals week, and our last eight junior bakers celebrate by making street food, as they combine part of a Sunday roast with a Middle Eastern filling, and make 3D doughnut displays.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay's Future Food Stars S1 Ep4
programme.desc: This time, it's all about fast food as Gordon invites a secret panel of industry giants to help him in his search for Britain's best food or drink entrepreneur.

programme.title: World's Most Luxurious S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Cars - Join us as we take a look at a world of different luxuries each week. In this episode we get to peek inside the world's most luxurious cars.

programme.desc: It's finals week, and our last eight junior bakers celebrate by making street food, as they combine part of a Sunday roast with a Middle Eastern filling, and make 3D doughnut displays.

programme.desc: Jamie's been experimenting with new recipes, and this week he's onto a winner with his Spiced cauliflower rice pie - a vegetable curry with a show-stopping difference: just before serving, Jamie flips it out like a beautiful rice cake.
